name: Slow Cooker Beef and Mushrooms
author: Amber Spanel Barbarotta
summary: One of my favorite meals as a kid, I now make this for my family. It is easy to throw together, and tastes great!
ingredients: 1 ½ pounds cubed beef stew meat
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed golden mushroom soup
1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix
directions: Combine the stew meat, mushroom soup, mushrooms with their liquid, and onion soup mix in the crock of a slow cooker
Pour in red wine, if desired
Cook on Low for 8 to 10 hours, or on High for 4 to 6 hours
In the last half hour of cooking time, bring the rice and water to a boil in a saucepan over high heat
Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until the rice is tender, and the liquid has been absorbed, 20 to 25 minutes
